basics.name: John Doe
basics.label: Business Development Manager
basics.summary: Experienced Business Development Manager with expertise in growing businesses, managing partnerships, and developing new strategic initiatives.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Platform for video content and targeted native video ads. Reported to COO and CRO with new business initiatives and business strategies for publishers and advertisers.
highlights: Launched Cinema6's first campaigns, with a premium spirits brand and athletic brand resulting in 100% profit
Negotiated contracts with 3rd party vendors (Jun Group, Veeseo, Adblade, Bidtellect).
Added clients to partner with by phone, email and meetings resulting in the creation of a pipeline for Cinema6
Composed weekly reports on new business, campaigns and other daily tasks.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Private Wealth Management - Alternative Investments. Supported and managed relationships with Financial Advisors in the Pacific Northwest and Mid-America regions, as well as throughout the country and internationally.
highlights: Educated Financial Advisors on specific Alternative Investment products.
Identified as the Sales and Service Desk Specialist with the highest and most consistent call record.
Developed and helped launch the Best Practitioner program for Financial Advisors.
Awarded 2013 Alternative Investments Most Net Sales to Budget for the Pacific Northwest Region.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided financial solutions for clients that reduced cash flow expenditures and realized losses on assets by utilizing underperforming assets to offset media expenditures.
highlights: Introduced ORION Trading to 75-150 accounts with annual media budgets.
Responsible for sourcing and brokering new business with clients.
Produced monthly newsletters for ORION clients and employees.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maximized Showtime Networks subscriber growth and revenue in affiliate customer service centers.
highlights: Managed 10 accounts in the cable industry sector.
Led on-site training and motivated affiliated Customer Contact Personnel.
Led new business development initiatives in Seneca, SC and Seattle, WA.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Conducted research for Portfolio Managers on portfolio investments. Tracked the trading volume and prices of key stocks for institutional and private clients.
highlights: Assisted the trading desk with market database analysis on prospective trades.

awards.title: New Jersey Hockey Hall of Fame inductee
awards.awarder: New Jersey Hockey Hall of Fame
awards.summary: Inducted into the New Jersey Hockey Hall of Fame.
